highlights.description: Automated marketplace publishing with GitHub PR creation

added.description: `publish` package for automated plugin submission to AI assistant marketplaces
`publish/github` client wrapper using gogithub for GitHub API operations

dependencies.description: Added `github.com/grokify/gogithub` v0.5.0 for GitHub API utilities

highlights.description: Multi-platform agent generation with new AWS adapters and genagents CLI

added.description: `agents/agentkit` adapter for AWS AgentKit/Agent Builder JSON format
`agents/awsagentcore` adapter for AWS CDK TypeScript code generation
`cmd/genagents` CLI for multi-platform agent generation from canonical specs

documentation.description: Comprehensive MkDocs documentation site with Material theme
Release notes section with v0.1.0 and v0.2.0 notes

infrastructure.description: GitHub Actions workflow for MkDocs gh-pages deployment

highlights.description: Initial release with unified configuration management for AI coding assistants supporting 9 tools

added.description: `mcp` package with adapters for MCP server configurations (Claude, Cursor, Windsurf, VS Code, Codex, Cline, Roo, Kiro)
`context` package with converter for generating CLAUDE.md from CONTEXT.json
`agents` package with adapters for AI assistant agent definitions (Claude, Codex, Gemini, Kiro)
`commands` package with adapters for slash command definitions (Claude, Codex, Gemini)
`plugins` package with adapters for plugin/extension configurations (Claude, Gemini)
`skills` package with adapters for reusable skill definitions (Claude, Codex)
`teams` package for multi-agent team orchestration with process types (sequential, parallel, hierarchical)
`validation` package with configuration validators (Claude, Codex, Gemini)
Adapter pattern with canonical types and tool-specific converters
Self-registering adapters via `init()` for automatic discovery
JSON Schema validation for plugins, commands, skills, agents, teams, and validation configs

documentation.description: ROADMAP.md and ROADMAP.json for project planning
README.md with installation and usage examples
PRESENTATION.md Marp slides for project overview
